issue.title: Current default branch tip cannot skip checkpoints

content.raw: Hi @aricstewart, I just tried with the current tip of the default branch and I couldn't reproduce the amazing Mars flight you have there. Do you mind checking if the issue has solved itself in the latest branch? Thanks and sorry for the trouble.
content.html: Hi @aricstewart, I just tried with the current tip of the default branch and I couldn't reproduce the amazing Mars flight you have there. Do you mind checking if the issue has solved itself in the latest branch? Thanks and sorry for the trouble.
